course_title: The Community Practice of Adult Education

022.comments: This is a core course for a Minor in Education, Community, Adult and Higher Education and for the Diploma in Education - Adult Learning and Education through the Faculty of Education.Registration will be blocked to Restricted seats only when all the General seats are filled.A waitlist is available for this course - ADHE 330 W3A. There is one waitlist for several sections of the same course. Waitlist becomes available when all course seats are filled. Students will be moved into the first available course seat, regardless of the course section.

63A.comments: This is a core course for the Diploma in Education - Adult Learning  and  Education, the Adult Learning  and  Education UG Certificate Program, and the Minor in Education - Community, Adult and Higher Education.Registration will be blocked when the course is full.A priority sequence waitlist is available for this course (ADHE 330 W3A). For information about how ADHE wait lists function, please visit https://pdce.educ.ubc.ca/online-courses/.

W3A.comments: This is a priority sequence waitlist for all sections of ADHE 330 in Winter 1. For information about how ADHE wait lists function, please visit https://pdce.educ.ubc.ca/online-courses/.

description: Community based adult education with particular emphasis on the application of knowledge of the social, economic, cultural and political environment in developing and conducting adult education programs with an for individuals and groups.
